scripts.render-postbuild: echo 'Starting render-postbuild' && prisma generate && echo 'Prisma generate complete' && node prisma/mark-migration-applied.js && echo 'Marked problematic migration as applied' && prisma migrate deploy && echo 'Prisma migration complete' && npm run build && echo 'Build complete' && node prisma/seed.js && echo 'Seed script complete'
